publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1816# Chris Ballance: National Anthem—That the Parliament believes that Scotland should adopt Robert Burns’, "A Man’s a Man for a’ That", as its national anthem.
S2M-1816# National Anthem (lodged on 1 October 2004) Rosie Kane*
S2M-1816# National Anthem (lodged on 1 October 2004) Colin Fox*
